name: Medic !
description:
Hi ! Wlecome in * Medic! *

You will play an AI and try to save as many victims as you can. The first game may be a bit hard, but try again and explore the talent tree to be the best.**

Feel free to post your saved / death ratio in the comments but remember: screenshot or it never happens!

Come to our ldjam entry page to leave feedbacks ;)
